job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: Primary Skills:1. Good hands on experience on AWS Container Orchestration ( Kubernetes, ECS)2. Good to have knowledge of REST API, Spring Boot and Microservice architecture.3. Experience on tools like bitbucket/GitHub, Postman, Swagger 4. Good to have knowledge of CI/CD pipeline like Bamboo, Jenkins. 5. Good knowledge and experience on AWS ECS Farget, Lambda, S3, CloudWatch, SQS/SNS, DynamoDB.6. Experience on Distributed Traceability tools like HoneyComb, X-Ray, Splunk etc7. Good knowledge and experience on Synthetic Monitoring, Performance tools like JMeter8. Good knowledge of SRE concepts like Resiliency, Availability, Circuit- Breaker , Chaos Testing, SPOGSecondary Skills:1. Nice to have experience on Agile methodology.2. Nice to have Configuration Management tools (Chef, Puppet)3. Nice to have Infrastructure as Code (Terraform, CloudFormation)
